desc: Otho, a part of Yeiser Research & Development. Otho Cosmetics was founded by Aubree (Yeiser) Strelic and her father John Otho Yeiser IV; the family inventing history dates to one of the first safety pins of the 1800’s by George Otho Yeiser.
